text: My Name Is Skrillex is the first EP by American electronic music producer, Skrillex. My Name Is Skrillex was released on June 7, 2010 on his MySpace profile. The album is the first solo EP by Sonny Moore under the alias Skrillex. He released a previous album titled Gypsyhook under his first name. ==Songs== ==Other websites== *My Name Is Skrillex at Discogs Category:2010 albums Category:Skrillex albums
title: My Name Is Skrillex
